title: First State National Historical Park: News Releases
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases               News Releases           Subscribe  | What is RSS     August 05, 2016  First State National Historical Park seeks residential Property Management Company  The National Park Service (NPS) is offering a unique opportunity to manage approximately 350 acres of leased property within the First State National Historical Park (FRST) through a Request For Proposals (RFP). The leased property includes eleven single family homes, four horse farms and approximately 240 acres of agricultural land.   May 02, 2016  BioBlitz is Coming to First State National Historical Park!  Get ready to explore First State National Historical Park like never before! On May 20-21, First State will participate in the National Parks BioBlitz.
